unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are You *Really* Seeing the Full Picture?**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Are You *Really* Seeing the Full Picture?**

unnormalised: Okay, influencer marketing is booming, right? But are you just blindly throwing money at folks with seemingly huge followings? Turns out, follower analytics is the real MVP, ya know?
normalised: Okay, influencer marketing is booming, right? But are you just blindly throwing money at folks with seemingly huge followings? Turns out, follower analytics is the real M V P, ya know?

unnormalised: Forget just the vanity metrics. We're talking deep dives. Fake followers? Engagement rates that look fishier than the fish market in Chennai at 6:00 AM? Good follower analytics tools can sniff 'em out faster than your auntie can spot a dodgy chaiwala.
normalised: Forget just the vanity metrics. We're talking deep dives. Fake followers? Engagement rates that look fishier than the fish market in Chennai at six A M? Good follower analytics tools can sniff 'em out faster than your auntie can spot a dodgy chaiwala.

unnormalised: Think beyond the likes. Demographics, location (is that 'influencer' *really* reaching your target audience in Bandra or just bots in Bangladesh?), activity patterns – it's all crucial. Companies like "Desi Digital" in Bangalore are offering analytics packages that promise to improve your ROI by up to 30% – that's like an extra Diwali bonus!
normalised: Think beyond the likes. Demographics, location (is that 'influencer' *really* reaching your target audience in Bandra or just bots in Bangladesh?), activity patterns – it's all crucial. Companies like "Desi Digital" in Bangalore are offering analytics packages that promise to improve your R O I by up to thirty percent – that's like an extra Diwali bonus!

unnormalised: Don't be a Bakra! Before you sign that big cheque with Ramesh's social media agency on 26/01/2024 at 14:00 hrs, ensure you're armed with solid data. Knowing who *actually* sees your sponsored content is key. And knowing who's *really* engaging with your product (and not just some auto-comment bot) is even more crucial. Plus, they say some analytics can even predict the future – okay, maybe not *that* far, but on 15/08/2023, the report said this tech would be useful!
normalised: Don't be a Bakra! Before you sign that big cheque with Ramesh's social media agency on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four at two P M, ensure you're armed with solid data. Knowing who *actually* sees your sponsored content is key. And knowing who's *really* engaging with your product (and not just some auto-comment bot) is even more crucial. Plus, they say some analytics can even predict the future – okay, maybe not *that* far, but on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three, the report said this tech would be useful!
